name: Heart on Fire
baseMeaning: A red heart engulfed in flames, representing passionate love.
tldr: Intense passion, burning desire, or overwhelming love. More intense than regular hearts.

contextMeanings.meaning: Being extremely attracted to someone or something.

platformNotes.note: Popular on romantic posts and thirst traps.
Used to show intense attraction to content or people.
Common in stan culture and intense appreciation.

generationalNotes.note: Used to express intense attraction or passion.
Less commonly used, may seem overly intense.

warnings.title: Context Matters
warnings.description: This emoji conveys intense passion - use thoughtfully in new relationships.
